projects: [{"title":"Lungs Cancer Detection Using Deep Learning(Object Detection)","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"* Working on Lung Cancer Detection using a state-of-art Deep learning algorithm like YOLO, Faster R-CNN.* Used YOLO algorithm to perform data segmentation on CT scan images of Lungs.* Working on training a pre-trained model called NiftyNet(a pre-trained model which is trained on large medical image dataset), using Transfer Learning."},{"title":"Income Classifier Model","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Oct 2019","description":"P.S.:-• Subsidy Inc. delivers subsidies to individuals based on their income• Subsidy Inc. has obtained a large data set of authenticated data on individual income, demographic parameters, and a few financial parameters• Subsidy Inc. wishes us to Develop an income classifier for individualSuggested Solution :• Applied KNN algorithm which gave an accuracy of 83.14% • Increased efficiency of the model using Logistic Regression by 3% "},{"title":"NEWS ARTICLE CLASSIFICATION MODEL","description":"• Used Naive Bayes Classiﬁer and TF-IDF Vectorizer in a pipeline(because of a large dataset) to classify an news article with 81% accuracy • Improved accuracy using Regularization and hyperparameter tuning"}]
